session.title: Data Science Tools: Numpy, Pandas og Matplotlib: Intro til moduler
session.format: In-person class with pre-learning videos and exercises

video_tutorials.title: Matplotlib Tutorial: For Physicists, Engineers, and Mathematicians
video_tutorials.note: Installation of 'SciencePlots' mentioned at the start is not necessary.

interactive_exercises.title: NumPy Practice with ChatGPT
interactive_exercises.description: Use the provided ChatGPT prompt to practice NumPy exercises covering array creation, manipulation, and mathematical operations. Focus on iterative learning with feedback.

learning_modules.title: Introduction to NumPy
activities: Review pre-learning video: 'Python NumPy Tutorial for Beginners'

learning_modules.title: Introduction to Matplotlib
activities: In-class demonstration: Plotting Big-O complexity graph

learning_modules.title: Basic Data Analysis Workflow
key_concepts: Loading data (e.g., from TSV files using NumPy)
Performing Linear Regression (using NumPy or SciPy)
Visualizing data and regression results using Matplotlib
activities: Exercise 2: Analyzing TSV datasets (mean, variance, correlation, linear regression, plotting)

learning_modules.title: Introduction to Pandas (Preview)
key_concepts: Understanding the role of Pandas in data analysis
Key data structures: Series and DataFrame (brief overview)
activities: Brief in-class mention, setting stage for next week

learning_outcomes: Use the Numpy library for numerical operations and array manipulation
Understand the purpose and basic concepts of the Pandas library
Use the Matplotlib library to create and customize basic data visualizations
